profile_positions.description:
Project Manager for an R&D EPC Project - Pilot Plant for Conversion of Waste Plastic to Diesel for CSIR - Indian Institute of Petroleum, Dehradun.

Project Manager in Delhi for Sohar LNG Bunkering FEED Project for Total in Vertical Split between Delhi and Paris.

Job Purpose - Coordinating the design and requisitioning of the portion of work assigned (per several disciplines or project areas and/or facility unit) in accordance with Company's QHSES corporate policies, contractual commitments (design data, codes, classes etc.), schedule and budget.

Key Interactions - Discipline leads/engineers. All Engineering disciplines, Sourcing & Procurement, Construction, Manufacturing. Clients, Subcontractors, Vendors, Partners, Authorities and licensors.

Main Accountabilities - 
• Within a critical economical area of action, ensures that engineering and requisitioning activities are developed according to schedule, man/hours, equipment and materials budget as well as contractual specifications
• Ensures timely reporting to Project Management and operational supervisor: follow up of activity, critical deviation of activities and/or potential risks
• Within his area of responsibilities, enforces QHSES corporate policies
• Ensures the interdisciplinary consistency of design and requisitioning documents
• Coordinates engineering and requisitioning activities of Group engineering centers and partners operating on the project for the portion of work assigned
• Coordinates engineering and requisitioning activities with procurement and construction
• Ensures that vendors’ documents are approved, commented, and returned to vendors on time
• Contributes in obtaining client approval on technical documents
• Ensures the production of documents required for the permitting process (as required by contract and authorities)
• Ensures that all disciplines under his/her responsibility have all information and data to proceed with activities
• Contributes to the definition of equipment lists
profile_positions.title: Senior Principal Engineer - Engineering Management

profile_positions.location: Gautam Buddha Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India
profile_positions.description:
Key interactions - 
• Directly supervises (operationally): potentially Special engineer - Equipment Engineering Level 1.
• Key interactions (internally, externally): Clients (technical specialists, procurement team), Vendors, Procurement, Planning, others engineering disciplines.

Main Accountabilities - 
• Ensures timely and qualitative preparation of technical specifications and requisitions in coordination with other disciplines.
• Ensures contractual technical specifications are met by the suppliers.
• Ensures proper communication with vendors and technical follow up of the orders.
• Adheres to the committed man/hours and budget.
• Ensures timely reporting on engineering / requisitioning activities to the Lead Discipline Engineer. 
• Meets quality and HSE objectives of the project.
• Interfaces with other discipline specialist engineers and possibly project support functions such as procurement and planning.
• Analysis & Design of Concrete Structure for Polymerization Structure with Reactor.
• Working on Modularization of Polymerization Structure with Reactor and analyzing in In-place, lifting, and transportation conditions.
• Structural Design and Analysis of Compressor Shelters, Steel Structure and Concrete Foundation, Cracking & Demo Furnace Piperacks with PSV Platforms, Technological Structures, Road Crossings, Support Structures etc.
• Provides guidance and mentoring to more junior engineering employees.
